item.title: Setting up AWS API Gateway using Chalice, SQS and Celery
item.description: End Goal To have an api that sends SQS messages to a queue to be processed by workers. Flow api request -> AWS API Gateaway -> SQS -> Celery Why? Why manage an api for yourself when chalice and AWS can handle it quite easily for you. Yes the cloud is someone else’s computer, but I don’t want to be woken up because a server is down. I would rather be notified because a behemouth like Amazon is down.
